query.statement: SELECT A.RECIPE_CD ,C.RECIPE_NAME ,NVL2(G.ITEM_CODE,'1','0') AS RESTRICT_YN -- 금지여부 ,D.ITEM_CODE ,F.ITEM_NAME --,I.FEATURE_NAME --자재특성 , FN_ITEM_FEATURE_ICON( (SELECT DUTY_YN FROM HLDC_PO_CONTRACT_F WHERE ITEM_CODE = D.ITEM_CODE AND ROWNUM <= 1 ), F.PB_YN, F.ECO_ITEM, '') AS FEATURE_NAME ,F.ITEM_SIZE --규격 ,F.PO_UOM --구매단위 ,E.MARGIN_PRICE --구매단가 ,D.NEED_QTY --표준1인소요량 ,ROUND(D.NEED_QTY * (NVL(E.MARGIN_PRICE,0) / F.KG_CONVERT_RATE / 1000) ) AS UNIT_COST -- 1인원가 FROM FMM_SINGLE_MENU_RECIPE A ,FMR_STD_RECIPE_MST C ,FMR_STD_RECIPE_ITEM D ,FMI_STD_PRICE E ,( SELECT ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_SIZE, PO_UOM, KG_CONVERT_RATE, ORIGIN_NAT, -- 표준에서는 어떻게 가져올지 추후 협의가 필요. 일단은 모두 'N'로 표시(센터별 기준업장으로 보여줄지는 협의가 필요) (2015.08.29) 'N' AS PB_YN, ECO_ITEM FROM HLDC_PO_ITEM_MST WHERE ITEM_CLASS1 = 'F' ) F ,(SELECT RESTRICT_SEQ, ITEM_CODE FROM FSI_RESTRICT_MST WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN RESTRICT_START AND RESTRICT_END AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) G ,FSI_ITEM_NUT H ,( SELECT ITEM_CODE, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0033' AND CODE = ITEM_FEATURE) AS FEATURE_NAME FROM FSI_ITEM_FEATURE WHERE (ITEM_CODE, CDATE) IN ( SELECT ITEM_CODE, MAX(CDATE) AS CDATE FROM FSI_ITEM_FEATURE WHERE (1=1) AND (CENTER_CODE, CUSTCD, ITEM_CODE, APPLY_DATE) IN ( SELECT CENTER_CODE, CUSTCD, ITEM_CODE, MAX(APPLY_DATE) AS APPLY_DATE FROM FSI_ITEM_FEATURE WHERE CENTER_CODE = '300001' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN APPLY_DATE AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(APPLY_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),1)-1,'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY CENTER_CODE, CUSTCD, ITEM_CODE ) GROUP BY ITEM_CODE ) ) I WHERE A.RECIPE_CD = C.RECIPE_CD AND C.RECIPE_CD = D.RECIPE_CD AND D.ITEM_CODE = E.ITEM_CODE(+) AND D.ITEM_CODE = F.ITEM_CODE AND D.ITEM_CODE = G.ITEM_CODE(+) AND D.ITEM_CODE = H.ITEM_CODE(+) AND D.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE(+) AND A.SINGLE_MENU_CD = #SINGLE_MENU_CD# ORDER BY A.RECIPE_SEQ, C.RECIPE_TYPE, C.CUISINE_TYPE, A.RECIPE_CD,ITEM_SEQ
